column1: Challenges with existing system
column2:
Limited customization – The current app is project-specific, making it difficult to adapt for new programs.
Manual data linkage – No case management feature, requiring manual linking of individuals in the backend.
Lack of auto-calculations – 
Paper-based limitations – The current system is inefficient for scaling and tracking community-based interventions.
Tight project timelines – Digitization needs to align with donor timelines, requiring a quick and flexible solution.

column1: Reason for shifting to Avni
column2:
1. Want to go Paperless and have organisation level MIS for project activties
2. Overcoming above challenges
3. Centralized data store and share
